law.catch_line: of Department for Income Support to United States central authority.
law.text: Under KRS 205.712, the Department for Income Support, Child Support Enforcement, within the Cabinet for Health and Family Services is recognized as the agency designated by the United States central authority to perform specific functions under the Convention.
law.history: Created 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 18, sec. 57, effective June 24, 2015.
